items.name: Speeding on site
items.description: Complaints have been made about vehicles speeding on site. If you are caught you will be removed from site.

items.name: High Viz jackets to and from lunch room
items.description: High visibility uniforms need to be worn when walking to lunch rooms, clockoff and the car park.

items.name: Clock on / off
items.description: Must be done on arrival or pay will be calculated from login time.

items.name: Equipment being left out on site
items.description: Gear has been left out overnight. All equipment needs to be returned to the container and or compound each night.
